name: Bhindi Masala Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Bhindi Masala Recipe: Bhindi ½ kg Chili powder 1 tsp heaped Garlic 1 tsp Salt 1 tsp Tomatoes 3 finely chopped Turmeric ½ tsp Kalonji ½ tsp Oil ½ cup Onion 1 fried light golden Green chilies small ones whole 4
instructions: Fry bhindi in oil till slightly brown, remove in the same oil fry garlic, salt, chili powder, turmeric Fry by adding little little water add chopped tomatoes, cook on slow fire Lastly add fried bhindi, green chilies, brown fried onion Leave it on dum for 10 minutes.
